name: react-seed
description: Koa server for kanban application with file-based storage

scripts.build: cd .. && npm install && npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true});for(const entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}};copyDir('./dist','./server-koa/public');"
